content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to talk about your daily routine, from morning to evening, in Dutch.
To say something happens 'at' a certain time, you use the word 'om'. For example, 'om zeven uur' means 'at seven o'clock'.

data.tip: This sound is like the 'ure' in 'pure', but with rounded lips.

content.text: To say how you travel, use the word 'met', which means 'with' or 'by'. For example, 'met de fiets'.

content.title: Your Morning Routine
content.setting: Your Dutch friend, Alex, asks you about your day. Start by describing your morning.

conversation_flow.title: State what time you wake up
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Hoi! Ik ben benieuwd naar jouw dag. Hoe laat word je wakker?

extract_info.wake_up_time: Extract the time the user wakes up, e.g., 'zeven uur'

conversation_flow.title: Mention your breakfast
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Aha, om {wake_up_time}. En wat eet of drink je voor het ontbijt?

conversation_flow.title: Explain how you go to work
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Klinkt goed. Hoe ga je naar je werk?

content.text: Great! Now let's talk about your work or study day. We'll need words for starting and finishing.

data.tip: The 'aa' sound is long, like the 'a' in the English word 'father'.

content.title: Your Workday
content.setting: Continue the conversation with Alex about your workday.

conversation_flow.title: State your start time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, interessant! En hoe laat begin je met werken?

conversation_flow.title: Say when you finish
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: En hoe laat ben je klaar met werken?

content.text: Almost done! Let's talk about the evening. You'll also learn how to ask a question back.

data.tip: The 'ij' sound is very typical in Dutch. It sounds like the 'ay' in 'say'.

content.title: Your Evening
content.setting: Finish your conversation by describing your evening and asking Alex about their day.

conversation_flow.title: Describe an after-work activity
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Zo, een volle dag! Wat doe je na het werk?

conversation_flow.title: State your dinner time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Leuk! En hoe laat eet je avondeten?

conversation_flow.title: Ask about their routine
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké. Dat klinkt als een goede routine.
